targets.query: from(bucket: "metrics") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_requests" and r._field == "latency_ms" and r.profile == "${profile}") |> group(columns: ["_field"]) |> window(every: ${agg}) |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "estimate_tdigest") |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time") |> window(every: inf)

from(bucket: "metrics") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_requests" and r._field == "latency_ms" and r.profile == "${profile}") |> group(columns: ["_field"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: count, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "metrics") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "cpu" and r._field == "usage_user" and r.profile == "${profile}") |> group(columns: ["_field"]) |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "metrics") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "security_events" and r._field == "score" and r.profile == "${profile}") |> group(columns: ["_field"]) |> window(every: ${agg}) |> quantile(q: 0.99, method: "estimate_tdigest") |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time") |> window(every: inf)

from(bucket: "_monitoring") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "runtime" and r._field == "Alloc") |> aggregateWindow(every: ${agg}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
